1.title: Carlos Carrasco's Ferrari 488

episode of.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Alex customizes Cleveland Indian's pitcher Carlos Carrasco's rare Ferrari 488 GTB. And, a 1975 International Harvester Scout is brought into the twenty first century with a total overhaul.

2.title: Cespedes' Mercedes GLE63

episode of.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Alex customizes a high-performance Mercedes SUV for All Star slugger, Yeonis Cespedes, and a family converts a Mercedes Sprinter into a rec room on wheels.

3.title: Beto Perez's Lamborghini Aventador

episode of.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Zumba fitness creator Beto Perez gets a customized 2017 Lamborghini Aventador, and Miami construction mogul Aquino Melo has his work-truck transformed into a luxurious ride.

4.title: Corey Shapiro's Cadillac Fleetwood

episode of.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Alex modernizes a vintage Cadillac Fleetwood to its former gangster glory for a fashion mogul specializing in celebrity eyewear, and All-Star shortstop Alexei Ramirez gets a custom Jeep Wrangler supercharged.

5.title: Teyana Taylor's Polaris Slingshot

episode of.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Pop superstar Teyana Taylor gets a 3-wheel Polaris Slingshot customized to turn heads on the streets of Manhattan, and Alex does a full-custom Jeep Wrangler for hot New York Yankees catcher Gary Sanchez.

imdb.plot outline: In the heart of Miami, cars and art collide at The Auto Firm where celebrity car guru Alex Vega customizes some of the hottest rides ever made. Get a look inside the exclusive world of Vega's high-end customizations for his elite celebrity clients including Akon, Marc Anthony, Teyana Taylor, NY Mets Star Yoenis Cespedes and many more.
imdb.title: The Auto Firm with Alex Vega
